name: Riot City (Rick Zhang, Zheister)
description:
The Government is FALLING APART, the People are ENGRAGED, and you must protect the House with MONEY, SOLDIER, and WITS!! Fix this UNSTABLE GOVERNMENT!

How To Play
  • You have money & soldiers to dispatch!
  • Money is used for:
    • PAY the incoming mobs' money demand, click on them and they'll disappear!
    • if the mobs aren't paid, they'll RIOT and APPROACH the House!
    • TRAIN more soldiers, click the TRAIN button!
  • Click TAX button to get more money, but ANGER LEVEL increases
    • The ANGRIER, the faster the mobs will come and riot
  • DEPLOY soldiers by clicking the four arrows around the House!
    • Has a cooldown time
    • Don't DEPLOY SOLDIERS on peaceful citizens, this will anger the people!
  • The House has a health bar, so protect it at all costs within the TIME LIMIT!
Controls
  • Mouse only
